医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
FDA 批准使用声波分解人体肿瘤进行肝脏治疗美国食品和药物管理局已批准使用声波分解人体肿瘤（一种称为组织解剖学的技术）来治疗肝脏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/FDA-approves-the-use-of-sound-waves-to-break-down-tumors-in- humans-for-liver-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/FDA-approves-the-use-of-sound-waves-to-break-down-tumors-in- humans-for-liver-treatment.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2adae831-63d5-4e12-ba4b-1f01c9650909 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 15:34:47 -0400 FDA approves the use of sound waves to break down tumors in humans for liver treatment
SNEB 立场文件强调大学生的食品和营养不安全问题营养教育与行为协会 (SNEB) 坚持其既定立场：大学生，尤其是来自服务不足社区的大学生，面临粮食和营养不安全的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/SNEB-position-paper-highlights-food-and-nutrition-insecurity-among-college-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/SNEB-position-paper-highlights-food-and-nutrition-insecurity-among-college-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1942a104-38b8-4b5f-b610-d82897fa445f Mon, 09 Oct 2023 15:31:31 -0400 SNEB position paper highlights food and nutrition insecurity among college students
伦敦大学获得 1600 万美元，用于为服务欠缺的社区培训更多初级保健医生路易斯维尔大学已收到 1600 万美元，用于帮助增加肯塔基州人获得医疗保健的机会，特别是在服务不足的农村和城市地区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/UofL-receives-2416M-to-train-more-primary-care-physicals-for-underserved-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/UofL-receives-2416M-to-train-more-primary-care-Physicians-for-underserved-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39d922f2-3b46-434c-b692-4f95e3bd817f Mon, 09 Oct 2023 15:21:42 -0400 UofL receives $16M to train more primary care physicians for underserved communities
大多数患者未充分利用 TAVR 后的心脏康复密歇根医学主导的一项研究发现，绝大多数接受微创心脏瓣膜置换手术的人没有参加推荐的心脏康复治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Cardiac-rehabilitation-after-TAVR-underutilized-by-majority-of-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Cardiac-rehabilitation-after-TAVR-underutilized-by-majority-of-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f59cc8d9-cd95-4afd-aaab-837051db58b5 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 15:06:36 -0400 Cardiac rehabilitation after TAVR underutilized by majority of patients
发现化合物通过靶向宿主酶抑制流感病毒复制如何阻止流感病毒的传播？为了开发治疗流感感染的新方法，波恩大学医院 (UKB) 心血管免疫学研究所和波恩大学免疫感觉卓​​越集群的 Hiroki Kato 教授获得了 220 万美元的开放慈善赠款。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Compound-found-to-inhibit-influenza-virus-replication-by-targeting-host-enzyme.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Compound-found-to-inhibit-influenza-virus-replication-by-targeting-host-enzyme.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d91c93cd-2611-4f92-bcde-c6cbf375b5b5 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 15:00:38 -0400 Compound found to inhibit influenza virus replication by targeting host enzyme
推出新论坛以支持实验动物行为研究COST Action TEATIME 为那些希望深入研究与实验动物行为研究相关的科学问题的人们推出了一个新的公共论坛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/New-forum-launched-to-support-behavioral-research-in-laboratory-animals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/New-forum-launched-to-support-behavioral-research-in-laboratory-animals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0a0c50a-dff5-4ca0-83c2-ef03235f796d Mon, 09 Oct 2023 14:55:01 -0400 New forum launched to support behavioral research in laboratory animals
麦克莱恩医院与 Rippl Care 合作，解决痴呆症老年人的心理健康需求为了解决痴呆症老年人及其家庭护理人员心理健康需求未得到满足的危机，以及缺乏具备治疗该人群专业知识的心理健康服务提供者的情况，麻省总医院布里格姆总医院的成员麦克莱恩医院已签订一项提供战略咨询服务的协议以及 Ripple Care 的专业教育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/McLean-Hospital-partners-with-Rippl-Care-to-address-mental-health-needs-of-seniors-with-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/McLean-Hospital-partners-with-Rippl-Care-to-address-mental-health-needs-of-seniors-with-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ea90bba-e73a-414b-bf28-ffaf0f64107a Mon, 09 Oct 2023 14:28:51 -0400 McLean Hospital partners with Rippl Care to address mental health needs of seniors with dementia
试验显示，Solriamfetol 可能是治疗成人多动症的有效替代品尽管有几种药物被批准用于治疗注意力缺陷/多动障碍 (ADHD)，但有些人从这些药物中获得的益处有限，或者会因使用而产生副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Solriamfetol-may-be-an- effective-alternative-for-managing-ADHD-in-adults-Trial-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Solriamfetol-may-be-an- effective-alternative-for-managing-ADHD-in-adults-Trial-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac11ae31-e07c-4f65-b07b-3af7954a61a4 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 13:19:53 -0400 Solriamfetol may be an effective alternative for managing ADHD in adults, trial shows
健康专家重新定义心血管疾病的风险、预防和管理根据美国心脏协会今天在该协会旗舰期刊《循环》上发布的新主席建议，健康专家正在重新定义心血管疾病 (CVD) 风险、预防和管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Health-experts-redefine-cardioangio-disease-risk-prevention-and-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Health-experts-redefine-cardioangio-disease-risk-prevention-and-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d41024d1-74b8-476b-bf56-4778ade98ab9 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 13:11:39 -0400 Health experts redefine cardiovascular disease risk, prevention and management
肺癌筛查资格新模型比当前 USPSTF 方法更准确一项新研究发现，识别符合筛查条件的肺癌患者的替代模型比目前使用的基于美国预防服务工作组 (USPSTF) 标准的方法更准确。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/New-model-for-lung-cancer-screening-eligibility-more-accurate-than-current-USPSTF-method.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/New-model-for-lung-cancer-screening-eligibility-more-accurate-than-current-USPSTF-method.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83fc1fc3-3b31-4b25-8a46-f83b8c1c55ae Mon, 09 Oct 2023 13:04:00 -0400 New model for lung cancer screening eligibility more accurate than current USPSTF method
